titleInfo.title: OpenAIRE Guidelines: Supporting Interoperability for Literature Repositories, Data Archives and CRIS

name.namePart: 2nd-Generation Open Access Infrastructure for Research in Europe

mods.abstract: OpenAIRE – Open Access Infrastructure for Research in Europe – is moving from a publication infrastructure to a more comprehensive infrastructure that covers all types of scientific output. To put this into practice an integrated suite of guidelines were developed with specific requirements supporting the goal of OpenAIRE and the European Commission. This poster outlines the OpenAIRE Guidelines, highlighting the set of guidelines for Literature Repository Managers, for Data Archive Managers and for CRIS Managers.
